item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

i had the most unkany feeling i couldnt call a void inside it so i foudn some other code we can use…

make the case look like this example

case 168: // Home if(IsAttacking == false) { teleportToX = 3303; teleportToY = 3123; }else{ sendMessage("you cant tele whilst in combat"); } break;
well that should most definetly work although if it dont then tell me

Read full topic

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

client.java:18784: 'void' type not allowed here if(!inCombat()) ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

I added this

[case 168: // Home if(!inCombat()) { teleportToX = 3303; teleportToY = 3123; }else{ sendMessage("you cant tele whilst in combat"); } break;/code]

Read full topic

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

try making your case look like the example below…

case 168: // first box if(!inCombat()) { teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = xxxx; //change xxxx to you coods }else{ sendMessage("you cant tele whilst in combat"); } break;
try that… it may work… but it might not, as i havent personally tested it …

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @bluurr bluurr
item.description:
@bluurr wrote:

look for something like this



				                            case 167: // beckon emote
                                startAnimation(0x360);
				break;
				                            case 172: // clap emote
                                startAnimation(0x361);
				break;
				                            case 166: // dance emote
                                startAnimation(0x362);
				break;
				                            case 52050: // panic emote
                                startAnimation(0x839);
				break;
				                            case 52051: // jig emote
                                startAnimation(0x83A);
				break;
				                            case 52052: // spin emote
                                startAnimation(0x83B);
				break;
				                            case 52053: // headbang emote
                                startAnimation(0x83C);
				break;
				                            case 52054: //joy jump emote

add/change the case that you want to tele you

like this
case 168: // first box teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = xxxx; //change xxxx to you coods break;

if you need any more help then post =P

Read full topic
